DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Gland Actual Volume Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating whether or not the patient has the prostate gland volume that meets the eligibility requirements for participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Gland Actual Volume Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.:Existing in fact; real._The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS)

Concepts.definition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.

Property.preferredName: Actual Volume Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Existing in fact; real._The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: What is the actual volume of the prostate gland?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Participant has/had a prostate volume of more than 60cc before start of Androgen Deprivation Therapy (ADT).
